response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is valued at $1,500,000 by you, but I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive investment for your business.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring my company's profitability. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the growth of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
